tasks.title: Task Management App
tasks.description: A web application designed to organize and manage daily tasks with full CRUD functionality. Users can easily create, view, update, and delete tasks, ensuring a streamlined experience for managing routine activities .

tasks.title: Interview-walkins App
tasks.description: An efficient scheduling platform that helps users organize and track interview dates and times. With user-friendly features, this app enables users to add and delete interview schedules

tasks.title: Taxi-Booking-App
tasks.description: Call Taxi is a quick and easy app for booking nearby rides, with real-time tracking, secure payments, and instant ride updates for a smooth experience.
